value: — busy city and link to the mainland
— Naxos was the first Greek colony in Sicily, now it is Giardini Naxos under the hill of Taormina

— A beautiful medieval town near Mt. Etna is listed among "I Borghi pui Belli D'Italia" (The Most Beautiful Towns in Italy) and provides a convenient central point for day trips to visit the Aeolian Islands, Tindari, Taormina, Giardini Naxos and Mount Etna
— the main resort & tourist spot. Great
and views of Etna and the coast
— beautiful group of volcanic islands (World Heritage)
— a deep impressive gorge carved by the Alcantara river on the edge of Etna

Come to visit and to taste the real Sicily to "Le Giare"- we are in Itala (Messina). Cosy environment, great food, amazing people - a place worth to see and to stay :)
